statement.p: What is the solution to \displaystyle{37}={7}{x}+{2}? Preview Question 1 Â

solution.p: \displaystyle{37}={7}{x}+{2}. We undo the \displaystyle+{2} by subtracting from both sides.
\displaystyle{35}={7}{x}. We undo the multiplication by \displaystyle{7} by dividing by \displaystyle{7} on both sides.
